client.Courses

Class CourseServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Courses.CourseServices

  • public class CourseServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the business logic related to the courses on the client side.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CourseServices(CoreClient coreClient) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getCourses()
      This method sends a message to the server to have the courses list (came from adminUI)
      void getCourses(int userID)
      This method sends a message to the server to have the courses list of the teacher (came from TeacherUI)
      void handleCreateCourse(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, int totalHours, int idT, int promo)
      This method creates String with all course attributes and send it to the server to create the course
      void handleCreatedCourse(java.lang.String msg)
      This method split the server message to see if the creation is a success or a failure.
      void handleDeleteCourse(int id)
      This method send to the server to delete the course
      void handleDeletedCourse(java.lang.String msg)
      This method split the server message to see if the deletion is a success or a failure.
      void handleUpdateCourse(int id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, int totalHours, int idT, int promoId)
      This method create String with all course attributes and send it to the server to update the course
      void handleUpdatedCourse(java.lang.String msg)
      This method split the server message to sse if the update is a success or a failure.

    • Method Detail

      • handleCreateCourse

        public void handleCreateCourse(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String description,
                               int totalHours,
                               int idT,
                               int promo)
        This method creates String with all course attributes and send it to the server to create the course
        Parameters:
        name - : course name
        description - : small description of the course
        totalHours - : the total hours of the course
        idT - : the referring teacher of the course
        promo - :the promo ID.

      • handleUpdateCourse

        public void handleUpdateCourse(int id,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String description,
                               int totalHours,
                               int idT,
                               int promoId)
        This method create String with all course attributes and send it to the server to update the course
        Parameters:
        id - : the course ID.
        name - : course name
        description - : small description of the course
        totalHours - : the total hours of the course
        idT - : the referring teacher of the course
        promoId - : the promo ID.

      • handleDeleteCourse

        public void handleDeleteCourse(int id)
        This method send to the server to delete the course
        Parameters:
        id - : course id

      • handleCreatedCourse

        public void handleCreatedCourse(java.lang.String msg)
        This method split the server message to see if the creation is a success or a failure. It change a state for the UI.
        Parameters:
        msg - : String with the result of creation

      • handleDeletedCourse

        public void handleDeletedCourse(java.lang.String msg)
        This method split the server message to see if the deletion is a success or a failure. It change a state for the UI.
        Parameters:
        msg - : String with the result of deletion

        This method split the server message to sse if the update is a success or a failure. It change a state for the UI.
        Parameters:
        msg - : String with the result of deletion
